robotics and engineering programs.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1507222485616 vc_row-has-fill vc_video-bg-container

div.h2: Horizon Science Academy Cincinnati Charter School

div.p: Parents can apply to HSA Cincinnati online for all grades here.

a.class: stm-btn stm-btn_outline stm-btn_white stm-btn_md stm-btn_icon-right stm-btn_color_white

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-7 vc_col-xs-12

div.p: Horizon Science Academy Cincinnati is a public charter school serving Kindergarten through eighth grades managing by Concept Schools. Concept Schools is a nonprofit charter management organization that provides a high-quality, STEM-focused and college-preparatory education through a network of charter schools while offering exceptional programs, comprehensive services, and opportunities to partner in education.

the 2019—20 academic year.

div.p: I have a daughter in the Kindergarten and she loves it here. Kiddy Kare works with this school. My daughter loves to wake up and come to Horizon Science Academy Cincinnati. Thank you.

My daughter is about to start third grade at Horizon Science Academy Cincinnati. She is so lucky that she has teachers who care so much about her well-belling. They reached out to her so quickly-it was clear that they pay close attention to their students.

My younger sister arrived in the United States of America from Guatemala this year. She has made an amazing amount of progress in such a short time because of the help she receives from the staff at Horizon Science Academy Cincinnati.

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs

p.span: Horizon Science Academy Cincinnati is managed by Concept Schools. Concept Schools is a nonprofit charter management organization that provides a high-quality, STEM-focused and college-preparatory education through a network of charter schools while offering exceptional programs, comprehensive services, and opportunities to partner in education.

h4.strong: Due to the evolving nature of Coronavirus Disease 2019,
All Horizon Science Academy campuses will be closed through May 1.
